DOC.brief_title: Incidence Of Hemidiaphragmatic Paralysis After Usg Guided Low Dose Interscalene Brachial Plexus Block
DOC.detailed_description: put catheter interscalene brachial plexus USG guide give bolus drug follow 24 hour continous infusion drug . To see hemidiaphragmatic paralysis see diaphragmatic excursion M mode Usg subcostal approach , see post operative pain , patient satisfaction score , complication
DOC.criteria: Patients age 1880 year belong ASA grade I , II , III , undergo either , shoulder surgery , ( rotator cuff repair , acromioplasty , hemiarthroplasty , total shoulder replacement ) surgery proximal humerus fracture recruit study . ) Patient refusal interscalene block b ) Severe respiratory disease ( FEV1/FVC < 0.7 FEV1 < 80 % predict ) c ) Allergy amide local anaesthetic drug ) Chronic opioid therapy e ) Patients understand operate PCA VAS
